bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: DL4J: SharedTrainingMaster controller address env var bug
bug.description: This should get the environment variable value, not use the key... <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/f0dfaa9d1f612c35d53f6437fc0d6176cc62238b/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j-scaleout/spark/dl4j-spark-parameterserver/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/spark/parameterserver/training/SharedTrainingMaster.java#L470>https://github.com/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j/blob/f0dfaa9d1f612c35d53f6437fc0d6176cc62238b/deeplearning4j/deeplearning4j-scaleout/spark/dl4j-spark-parameterserver/src/main/java/org/deeplearning4j/spark/parameterserver/training/SharedTrainingMaster.java#L470</denchmark-link>
